text:
Array Health Announces Acquisition By GetInsured
By GetInsured|Wednesday, November 30, 2016
Since starting Array Health in 2006, we have been focused on bringing e-commerce to healthcare by partnering with insurers. Weve grown from a three-person team into one of Seattles Best Companies to Work For. We love what we do and were proud of what we have accomplished over the past ten years.
Last year, we partnered with GetInsured to add their individual product solution to our platform. We soon realized that we shared a similar mission, customer focus, start-up mindset, and complementary products. Moreover, weve loved working with their team.
Today, we announced our acquisition by GetInsured, enabling us to deliver a solution that is scalable and solves for both employer and individual health insurance shopping and enrollment. Together we can pursue our shared objective to reinvent how consumers shop and enroll in health insurance.
Read the press release.
